 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַלְמָ֫וֶת‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==death-shadow, deep shadow==, in poetry (probably = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֵל‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָוֶת‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. (usually) <span class="bdbLangGreek">σκιὰ θανάτου</span>, compare [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]], so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Leben n. d. Tode, 194</sup>, see especially [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZAW xvii (1897), 183 ff.</sup>; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Br|Br]] and most modern (after older commentaries) read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַלְמוּת‎</span> ***darkness, deep darkness***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV, Assyrian [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒalâmu***</u></abbr>], Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be black, dark***); **\*\***compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***darkness***; We<sup>Kl. Proph. ed. 3, 81</sup> would read feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְלָמוֺת‎</span>, like <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Qor 2:16; 2:18; and frequently. — ***death-shadow***, often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חשֶׁךְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה‎</span> etc., and opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּקֶר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺר‎</span>. 

**1.** = ***deep shadow, darkness*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְרֵי אֵל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְזֵי אֵל‎</span>): [[Amos.5.8|Amos 5:8]]; [[Job.3.5|Job 3:5]]; [[Job.12.22|Job 12:22]]; [[Job.24.17|Job 24:17]]a [[Job.28.3|Job 28:3]]; [[Job.34.22|Job 34:22]] of eyes heavy with weeping [[Job.16.16|Job 16:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלְהוֺת צ‎</span>[[Job.24.17|Job 24:17]]b ***terrors of the darkness.*** 

**2.** figurative


$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of distress [[Jer.13.16|Jer 13:16]]; [[Ps.107.10|Ps 107:10]]; [[Ps.107.14|Ps 107:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ צ‎</span> [[Isa.9.1|Isa 9:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of extreme danger [[Jer.2.6|Jer 2:6]]; [[Ps.23.4|Ps 23:4]]; [[Ps.44.20|Ps 44:20]]. 

**3.** characterizing world of the dead, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ חשֶׁךְ וצ‎</span> [[Job.10.21|Job 10:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺ אֹפֶל צ‎</span> v[[Job.10.22|Job 10:22]] (text dubious, see [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשַׁעֲרֵי צ‎</span> [[Job.38.17|Job 38:17]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">πυλωροὶ δὲ ᾅδου</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעֲרֵימָֿ֑וֶת‎</span>).
